inn1.comm: that didn't take too long! Bracken gets cracking swing straightaway, it first angles into Tamim, that draws him forward but the ball suddenly swerves the other way and a helpless Tamim forces an edge down to David Hussey at second slip who falls to his right
and Bracken nearly induces another edge, Junaid drives and misses a full delivery
shows better judgement this time as he shoulders arms to a good length delivery
Bracken teases him around that off stump again, pitches outside off and moves away only slightly, beats the bat
and once again, it pitches outside off and moves away after pitching, he half heartedly pokes his bat out at it
gets well forward to a full delivery outside off and he gets a thick outside edge which rolls past the vacant gully region
Clark thuds it in short of a length and  he gets his elbows high to defend it
bangs it in short of a length again but this moves away, he hangs his bat out and angles it square of the wicket on the off side
lands it on the leg stump line this time and gets good bounce, he isn't sure what to do and withdraws the stroke as the ball rolls off his pads
he gets on the back foot and the ball beats him
Clark angles it down the leg side and Mehrab nudges it off his pads very late, beats Haddin
angles just wide of the leg stump and this time he fails to make contact, the umpire Saheba is lenient on Clark
lands outside off and angles away, beaten
thrusts his front foot forward to another away swinger and safely shoulders arms
and again he gets good away movement and the batsman safely sees this through to the keeper
lunges forward to the pitch of the ball and pushes a full delivery across the line to mid-on
holds the length back a fraction, he gets on the back foot and defends to the on side
he squeezes out a fuller delivery down to mid-off
gets forward and tries to steer it past the infield on the off side and Clarke does really well to slide and intercept it at point
tries out the shorter one and Clark gets steepling bounce through to Haddin, well left by Mehrab
gets back and across and angles it wide of backward point for a single
gets a bit of bounce and width outside off to work with and Junaid flashes hard at it down to third man
hits a good length outside off, he lets it go
just strays down the leg side, he tries to work it really fine  but the ball clips his pad and rolls to fine leg

Bracken strikes again and this time Michael Hussey assists him, he pitches it up outside off and gets it to angle away from the left hander, Mehrab pays the price for a half-hearted prod and the ball takes the thick outside edge and runs to Hussey at third slip who dives to his left for the catch
hits a good length outside leg, he shuffles just a touch at his crease and tucks it wide of square leg
gets forward and taps it with soft hands in front of mid-off and sets off, Ashraful calls for the run and sets off like a hare
gets forward for the drive and just angles his bat at the point of contact, that helps him ease it past mid-off
grants him width outside off and he gets forward to the pitch of the ball and drives wide of the covers
hits a good length on middle and leg, he nudges it straight to short fine leg
Clark nearly gets his man, he bangs it in short and wide outside off and Junaid can;t resist an upper cut, fortunately the ball dips in front of Johnson at third man
Appeal Pitches outside off and almost slices the batsman in half, the ball clips his pad and Haddin and Clarke appeal confidently for a catch, umpire Saheba shakes his head and it's a good decision
loses his line and strays wide down the leg side
strays just a touch wide outside off and moves away slightly, left alone

Ashraful falls for the bait and an all too easy wicket for Clark, he bowls it full and wide outside off and invites the square drive, Ashraful looks to smack that but the ball clips the top of the bat and flies to White at first slip
bangs it in short of a length outside off and that fizzes past Shakib
varies his length nicely and pitches it up, the away movement teases Shakib as he fails to make contact with the drive
probes away outside the off stump and gets good away movement, he shoulders arms
this time he gets the inswinger going as he safely lets it go
it pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching Haddin, three balls, three variations
almost had him there! Junaid's a little late in evading the bouncer and he hangs the periscope out, the ball catches the edge and fortunately lands safely in front of square leg
pitches outside off, he shoulders arms
pitches outside off again and he shoulders arms
pitches it up and swings away, he gets forward and the outside edge travels past gully
tries to turn it fine but mistimes it to square leg
swings in and lands on a full length, he shapes to drive straight but mistimes it to mid-on
pitches outside off on a good length and darts into the left hander, safely negotiated
hits a good length outside off and he gets behind the line and defends
hits the deck hard outside off  but doesn't get much bounce this time before reaching the keeper
gets good away swing again, he shoulders arms
just holds the length back a little and he gets his elbows high and steers it towards cover
gets to the pitch of the ball, offers the full face of the bat and eases it past mid-off, that's the most confident shot we've seen today
slides down the leg side
good length on middle and off, he defends down the pitch
fails to control the away movement this time as he strays wide of the off stump
lovely shot, the first boundary of the morning, he leans forward on seeing the ball angle across him, gets his elbows high and plays a neat square drive wide of cover
gets forward and pushes it to the on side
Hopes strays down the leg side, wide called
mush better, he hits the deck hard and Shakib gets behind the line and defends
and again he thuds it short of a length on middle and off, he covers the line and defends on the back foot
just a touch fuller, drifts on the pads and he tucks it to the on side
gets a thick inside edge onto his pads as he lunges forward to defend, the ball lobs off his pads and falls well short of Hopes
pushes forward and steers it wide of gully, good calling by Shakib for the run
gets on the backfoot and defends back to the bowler
cracker of a shot, Johnson errs by giving too much width, the ball keeps a little low but he punches it off the meat of the bat and beats extra cover
fires in a low full toss and the ball swings away only slightly, he pushes it straight to mid-on and shows his frustration for not putting it away
just strays down the leg side
driven to extra cover for a single
hits a good length outside off and moves away, he gets a good stride forward and taps it towards cover
attempts an inswinging yorker and the ball hits him low on the pad outside the line of leg stump, Bruce Oxenford shakes his head when they appeal for a leg before
hits a good length outside off, he angles it down to point
holds the length back outside off, he drives away from his body and pushes it to third man
plays a very punchy straight drive and beats the bowler, pity here wasn't enough timing to reach the boundary
beats him, well bowled, pitches outside off and shapes away, not too far from the edge
gets across his stumps and defends on the back foot
fuller in length, he lunges forward and defends down the track
drives just a little away from his body and mistimes it down to mid-off
just short of a good length outside off, he gets forward initially and then moves back and punches it down to the off side
short and wide outside off, he shapes to slam it square of the wicket on the off side but finds backward point
strays down the leg side and Johnson really gets away with that one, should have been a wide and possibly a four down to fine leg
tries to whack that past mid-on but he mistimes his drive
gets back and across and pushes it to the off side
gets forward to the pitch of the ball and taps it down to mid-off
he teases him with an away swinger outside off and he nearly edges it through to the keeper
bangs it in short and he gets on his knee quickly to evade that, Hopes gets good pace
slightly fuller in length, he gets forward and taps it down to point
almost had him there, he gets to angle across the left hander and Junaid pokes forward and fails to make contact with the drive
ends a very probing over with one that fizzes past Junaid outside off
fullish outside off, he gets on his knee and creams it to the off side but can't beat backward point
good length outside off, pushed to the off side
just short of a length, he gets in the back foot this time and defends
flashes hard at one wide outside the off stump, he gets a thick under edge which just falls short of Haddin
Johnson struggles with his line and sprays that wide down the leg side
Shakib loses his patience and flays hard at one outside the off stump and misses, he doesn't move his feet at all
gets forward and pushes this to the on side
pitches outside off and holds its line, he watchfully lets it go
gets well forward, covers the line and pushes it to the off side
loses his concentration and fishes at one which seams away from him, far close the edge there
supreme confidence in that stroke, it pitches on a good length on off and middle, he gets about a pace forward and lofts across the line over midwicket, a couple of bounces and four
holds the length back, he turns the face of the bat and tucks it wide of square leg
short and wide outside off, he flashes it down to third man
bang! Johnson dishes it very short and wide outside off, Shakib leaps in the air and flays that high over backward point
tucks it with soft hands to the on side and sets off for a quick single, the under arms flick misses the stumps
gets forward and drives towards mid-off
looks to get aggressive again but he mistimes his loft which falls short of deep point
Junaid loses his concentration, Johnson delivers that back of a length and the ball kicks up and holds its line, he fails to withdraw his bat on time and the thick edge is taken by Haddin
hits a good length down the leg side, he nudges it off his hips to square leg
skids through off a good length, he gets forward and defends to the off side
angles this one across the left hander, he pushes this one to the off side
gets behind the line and defends to the off side
gets forward to a fulish delivery and works it across the line to the off side
holds the length back outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
gets it to move in to the right hander, he covers the line well and defends
almost a run out, he taps it to point and decides against the run, Kapali turns back and almost gives up but luckily Michael Clarke's throw was wide
loses his line and strays wide down the leg side

hits a good length on middle and off, the ball swings in quite sharply with the angle and Shakib tries to whip it across the line, the ball hits the back pad and umpire Oxenford thinks for a while before raising the finger. You can argue that the ball may have missed leg stump but Shakib moved across a bit too much
pitches outside leg, he tucks it to short square leg
left alone to the keeper
gets nice steepling bounce and Ghosh just manages to withdraw his bat
shuffles across his stumps and clips it wide of short square leg
gets forward and taps it with soft hands wide of cover and sets off
hits a good length outside off, he gets his elbows high and punches it down to the covers
gets across his stumps and punches it off the meat of the bat to the off side
hits a good length outside off, he punches it again to the off side

very very soft dismissal, Kapali decides to take the aerial route this time but fails to execute it properly as he tamely chips a full delivery down to Watson at mid-off who's standing well forward from the conventional position, Bangladesh just can't get sizable partnerships going
defended to the on side
strays down the leg side, wide called
gets well forward and smothers the spin
gives it a lot of air, he gets on his knee and fetches that from outside off, fine leg fields it
very wide down the leg side, goes for a wild sweep and misses
shapes to bang that through the off side, misses it
mush better, he gets to the pitch of the ball and defends
gets across and tucks it behind square on the on side
loses his line and sprays that wide down the leg side
flighted outside off, he gets well forward and defends
hits a good length outside off, he gets behind the line and defends
pitches on off and middle, he gets across and defends
pitches on off and middle, he gets across and taps it back to the bowler
this oen skids through quickly off the pitch and beats the bat
shuffles across his stumps and taps it away to the off side
very similar delivery, Razzak does well to get behind the line and defend
fetches that from wide outside the off stump and paddles it it away to fine leg
flighted down leg, he gets on his knee and sweeps
flighted outside off, he scoops it high over cover
lobs up high and lands on a full length outside, he goes for a booming off drive but the ball creeps under the bat
this time he watchfully lets it go
gets back and across and works it to the on side
squares up Dhiman Ghosh, the ball goes to the point region.
this time gets behind the delivery and defends to the off side.
fuller delivery worked square of the wicket on the onside, played in the gap.
driven back down the track, fielded on his follow-through by Watson.
slower delivery worked behind square leg to the deep for a single, fielded by Bracken.
finishes the over with a bouncer.
worked to the onside.
pushes in the gap to the off side for a single.
comes down the track and lofts it down the ground to long off.
worked behind square leg for a single.
beats the outside edge of the bat as he plays forward.
clears his right leg and hits it in the air and in the gap to midwicket fence.
pushes in the gap wide of mid-off for a single.
short delivery defended to the onside.
pitches outside off, he gets across and defends to the off side
pitches around middle and leg, he gets across and taps it towards mid-on
bangs in the bouncer and he misdirects it just wide down the leg side, that's the one bouncer for the over
loses all his patience with a wild swish outside off, foot movement was zilch
Appeal! Taps it Hussey at gully and sets off, David Hussey hits the stumps but Ghosh is home
stays on the back foot, waits for the ball to come onto him before punching it towards cover
nudged away towards fine leg, they take the first run quickly and they complete the second quite easily
flighted outside off, he lunges forward and pushes it to the off side
gets on the back foot and clips it across the line to the on side
attempts a leg break and Razzak expects it to turn, the ball however goes through straight and Razzak can't get behind the line to defend, the outside edge lobs to Clarke at first slip
shuffles across his stumps and tucks it to square leg
just back of a length outside off, he withdraws his bat and lets it go to the keeper
full and wide outside off and he flashes hard at it and takes a single to third man
stays on the back foot but the ball skids through and hits his pad outside the line of leg stump, Watson appeals half heartedly
hits a good length on off and middle, he gets behind the line and pushes it down the pitch
tests him out with a bouncer and Mortaza does well to evade it
gets on his knee and plays a premeditated paddle down to fine leg, he likes to fetch those from outside the off stump
gets forward to defend but he chips it slightly in the air
full and wide outside off and he drives hard to sweeper cover
gets down early for a wild slog across the line and the ball hits his arm and crashes onto his visor, otherwise his jaw would've taken a blow
wide outside off, he cuts to the off side
gets on the back foot and cuts behind square on the off side for another single
fires in the bouncer, he evades it easily by swerving away
makes him play this time as he taps a good length delivery back down the pitch
good length on off and middle, it comes back in and he defends
aimed at the body and Mortaza does well to rock backwards and defend it away
slower ball outside the off stump, he gets well forward and defends
edged and just falls short of slip, another slower one from Watson,he pokes his bat out plays at it with soft hands
drifts on the pads, he tucks it to the on side
gets forward and drives to Hussey at cover
Bangladesh's first of the series! He gives it a lot of air outside off, he plans his shot in advance, gets on his knee and slog sweeps it over deep midwicket
a repeat stroke, White gives it air outside off again, he gets on his knee and this time just fails to clear the midwicket boundary
paddles it from outside off and gets a couple to fine leg
gets well forward and defends
flighted on middle and off, he turns the face of the bat and tucks it to the on side
hits a good length outside off and gets it to move away after pitching, he taps it to point

he goes for broke straight down the ground but makes a mess of it, he stays rooted to the crease as he faces up a full delivery from Clark, the top edge travels to Watson at mid-off who pedals backwards to take the catch, terrible shot and Ghosh will regret it
well Mortaza tries to carve a short delivery over the off side but gets a bottom edge down to Haddin
fires the bouncer outside off and Mortaza takes his eyes off the ball as he evades it
the slower ball and Mortaza picks it well and defends on the front foot
full and wide outside off, he chases it and carves it over the vacant backward point region
flighted outside off, he gets forward and pushes it through the line to long-off
all squared up by the googly, White mixes it up well, pitches outside off and cuts back in sharply, catches Nazmul on the back foot, that was fairly plumb in front
gets to negotiate a googly straightaway, he manages to defend
picks the googly again and defends on the backfoot
turned to the on side and they take off for a quick single, the throw to White was a little late
full outside off, pushed to cover
hits the deck hard, he ducks under the bouncer comfortably
dug in short outside off, he attempts a pull but misses
the slower ball, lands on a yorker length, he manages to squeeze it out
confusion! Pushes it to Watson at mid-off and sets off, there's hesitation in the running and Watson has a shy at the stumps at the non-striker's end but Clark's nowhere in the picture
tucked away behind square on the on side for a single
shoulders arms outside the off stump
flays at one wide outside off, nearly threw his wicket away
backs away from the stumps and angles it wide of Clarke at point, he has a shy at the stumps but Mortaza gets back in time
fizzes past his off stump, he hangs his bat out and then withdraws
the angle is just a little wider outside off, he shows his bat out and steers it down to third man
this one really kicks up back of a length, Haddin takes it quite high over his head
pitches outside off and holds its line, he lets it go
bowls the slower one and draws him forward, that nearly takes the outside edge
angles it towards the pads, he nudges it off his pads and takes a single
he takes advantage of a packed infield by scooping an overpitched delivery over extra cover
angled towards the pads and he chips it just in front of mid-on
gets on the backfoot and steers it down to third man
full outside off and driven to mid-on

terrific delivery from Johnson and that would have claimed even the best batsman, angles it into the right hander and lands it back of a length, the ball then moves away from Mortaza after pitching and all he can do is tamely edge it to Haddin

inn2.comm: on a length, drifting on to Marsh's pads, it runs away behind square for a leg bye
shortish and wide outside off, pitches and moves further away, Watson watches it through to the keeper
back of a length, angling in towards leg stump,, turns it away square
good length, angles away from the left handed batsman, left alone
good delivery and well left by Marsh, back of a length, outside off and comes back in to Marsh
and he's speared that down the leg side, goes through to the keeper

better delivery this time, on middle and leg and Marsh pushes it towards mid-on and charges off for the single. Watson wasn't interested and confusion reigned but there was as much confusion between the two Bangladesh fielders who went for the ball and Marsh gets back safely
starts off with a yorker just outside off, dug out by Watson in front of point, batsmen scamper through for a single
gets forward and defends back down
overpitched, on the leg stump, and Marsh whips it away  off the front foot to the square leg boundary. Superb timing there
on the pads again, but a better length this time and Marsh defends it back to the bowler
similar delivery, this time Marsh defends it to the leg side
on leg stump again, Marsh shuffles across to try and tickle it to fine leg, it races off his pads for another boundary
back of a length, on middle and leg, defended off the back foot
outside off this time, and Watson jabs it towards point
length, on middle and off, Marsh defends towards point unconvincingly
outside off and Marsh shoulders arms to that
good length on middle, and that came back in to Marsh, hits him on the front pad
outside off and left alone by Marsh, wicketkeeper Dhiman Ghosh had to dive to his right to collect that
sortish and a bit of width, Watson cuts it behind point
full and wide outside off, Marsh goes for the big off drive, but gets a thick inside edge and the ball trickles towards the leg side
shortish and strays on to Marsh's pads, he turns it behind square,
outside off and Watson easily runs it down to third man
better line to Marsh this time, he defends it to the off, thinks about a single but decides against it

mid-pitch collision here. a good length ball on the stumps, Marsh pushes it down the ground and sets off for a single. He collides with Shahadat who was in his follow through. There was an opportunity for a run out there at the non-striker's end after that collision slowed Marsh down but Ashraful, the fielder at mid-off, decides against attempting it
defended to the leg side for a single
good length and Watson goes for a booming drive, doesn't get hold of it and it goes one bounce to mid-off.
wristy shot, fetches himself a couple of runs on deep square leg
bit of width and Watson cuts it hard, Junaid Siddique dives at point to stop that. A superb piece of fielding
pitches on off and middle and comes into Watson, he tries to flick it but is struck high on the pad
the big shot works this time. Smashed over wide mid-on.
Good ball to start the over. On a length, on middle and leg and defended back to the bowler
back of a length, on Marsh's pads, he tries to tuck it behind square but short fine leg ensures there no runs taken
shortish and on the pads again, Marsh turns it towards deep square leg
again on the leg stump, this time to the right-handed Watson, and clipped behind square on the leg. These are easy runs for Australia
forward defence towards cover
length delivery outside off, Watson is beaten as he tries to steer it to the off side
shortish ball, given room to free his arms, Marsh square drives it off the front foot for a four. Superbly timed
single this time, wide of point
Watson gets some width and he cuts it powerfully but can't beat the fielder
slower ball outside off, Watson jabs it behind square and it bounces over the fielder at gully
going across Marsh and he lets it go through to the keeper
on his legs, worked away to the leg side
length, wide outside off, Marsh tries to cut but misses it
short ball this time on and turns towards beyond leg and Marsh sweeps it for a boundary
good line and length, defended off the back foot
getting some turn from outside off, did more than Marsh expected, turned to leg
goes for the short arm pull, it flies towards the fielder long-on but lands short of him
shortish, and width provided, Marsh helps it on its way to third man
back of  a length, Watson attempts a big slog, mistimed to deep midwicket
beaten this time by the outswinger, good length in the channel and Watson tried to defend that
He wasn't trying to defend this one, square drive off the front foot, lot of power behind that shot, he didn't time that very well
shorter delivery, moving away and Watson is beaten again as he tries to defend
short of a length, outside off and Watson defends it watchfully towards point
fires in a yorker length delivery outside off and Masha chases it, not too far from the edge
fires in another yorker length ball and Marsh firmly digs it out
short of a length outside leg and Marsh pulls to deep square leg, Razzak runs from deep midwicket does very well to try and pull it back but the ball just brushes the rope
grunts as he delivers, slides down the leg side and wide called
short outside the off stump and Marsh has enough width to angle it wide of backward point, there's protection in the deep for the cut
superb placement there, he drops it just a fraction short and Watson leans onto the drive and times it crisply past cover
oversteps and slides it wide down the leg side, Shahadat's trying his level best I can tell you
Free Hit He hits the deck hard and Watson gets in position for the pull but the timing isn't spot on, midwicket runs back and cuts it off
flightes it down the leg side, he nudges it off his pads
gets on the backfoot and defends down the track
reads the flight early and steps down the track and clears mid-off comfortably, good shot
flighted down the leg side, he gets on his knee quickly and places it to deep square
gets on his knee early for a premeditated slog but he misses it completely
flighted on middle and leg, he gets on his back foot and defends
he offers a lot of width outside off and allows an easy single down to sweeper cover
drops it a fraction short, he hops at the crease, opens the face of the bat and angles it down to third man
mixes it up well with a slower ball and Marsh goes for a swish outside the off stump, a little closer to the off stump and he'd have been in trouble
conventional pace this time, pitched up outside the off stump and he taps it down to cover
exterts himself a little too much and he oversteps, cramps him for room to cut and Marsh ends up chopping the ball down the pitch
Free Hit Well for once a free hit is rightfully dispatched, he backs away a bit and scoops a full delivery on the middle stump over mid-on, the ball lands just inches short of the rope
good length outside off, defended to the off side
short of a length outside off, he fetches it and pulls across the line past Razzak at mid-on
tries to dab one down to third man but is cramped for room
gets forward and defends
flighted on middle and leg, he turns it to the on side for a single
Bangladesh have something to smile about, Shakib pushes that flatter and faster, lands on middle and leg, Watson commits a little too early to the sweep and the ball hits him in front of middle stump
flighted outside off, left alone
full outside the off stump, he leans forward and pushes it through the line to mid-off
hits a good length on middle and leg, he shuffles and tucks it away to the on side
drops it short and wide outside off and Marsh latches onto this gift quickly, he rocks back and carves it wide of cover and backward point
good comeback by the bowler as he fires a yorker outside leg, Marsh nearly falls over as he squeezes it out, Shahadat appeals for a leg before but that was missing leg by  a mile
swivels on the back foot and pulls with intent, only for a single though as he finds fine leg
Clarke digs out a yorker to mid-off to get off the mark
flighted on middle and leg, he gets back and defends
a few more smiles for the men in green, Clarke suddenly has a rush of blood and  gives him the charge, he's beaten in flight and fails to drag his foot back before Ghosh effects the stumping
fired on the pads, he works it to deep midwicket
pushed back to the bowler
pushed towards point
gets on the front foot and defends
starts off with a slowish yorker, he gets under it and digs it out
hits a full length outside off and he's solid in defense
shuffles just a touch and angles it down to backward point
full and angling across the left hander, he cuts through the off side but Tamim intercepts at extra cover
good length outside off, he steers it down to backward point
hits a good length outside off, he defends to the off side
flighted outside leg, he nudges it to the on side
flighted outside off, gets forward and defends
gets on the backfoot this time and defends
drops it a fraction short and wide outside off, he rocks at the crease and slices it wide of extra cover, Shahadat just pulls it back before the rope
sticks his pad forward and shoulders arms
shuffles across his stumps and works it away to the on side
Dropped Mashrafe deserved  a wicket there, Marsh lazily pushes at one that angles away from him off a good length, Kapali has it covered at first slip but spills the catch on the dive
shoulders arms to one that holds its line after pitching
angled towards the body, he tucks it to square leg
angles it towards the body again and this time he works it with the line to fine leg
hits a good length outside off, he taps it with soft hands and turns down a single
pitches on middle and goes through dead straight, he gets behind the line and taps it away
floated down the leg side, he gets down and sweeps to short fine leg
shuffles at the crease and nudges it with the turn to short fine leg
stays at the back foot and taps it wide of cover
pushes a full delivery through the line to long-on
flighted on off and middle, he defends
gets on the backfoot and pushes it back to the bowler
pitches outside off, he chops it down to backward point
gets forward and taps it away to the off side, searches for the single but turns it down
safely shoulders arms outside the off stump
he lunges forward and tries to steer this wide of point, his fifty will have to wait
pitches outside off and holds its line before reaching Ghosh
full outside off, he takes a couple of paces forward and swings across the line to bring up his fifty
driven to mid-off for a single
pitched just outside off and turned in, got the outside edge, falls wide of slip
defended off the back foot
worked away behind square on the leg side
back of a length, he backed away crashed that through cover. Superb footwork there
comes down the ground, wristy shot through square leg
tried to smash that down the ground, but mistimes it and doesn't beat the bowler
short of a length, on middle and leg, defended to the off side
outside off and he watches it through to the keeper
some width offered and he cuts it to point
in the corridor outside off, Hussey shoulders arms
soft hands, defended to the off, thinks about a single but decides against it
pitches outside leg, Marsh goes for the big sweep but doesn't connect
similar delivery, sweep attempted again, gets a top edge and trickles towards fine leg
Marsh comes down the track and lofts it back over the bowlers head and that has carried all the way for six
And Marsh completes the formalities as the short ball is cut through cover
